name: CLKComplicationDescriptor
desc: A descriptor that defines a complication and the families that it supports.

items.name: init(identifier: String, displayName: String, supportedFamilies: [CLKComplicationFamily], userActivity: NSUserActivity)
items.desc: Returns a new complication descriptor with an associated user activity.

items.name: init(identifier: String, displayName: String, supportedFamilies: [CLKComplicationFamily], userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any])
items.desc: Returns a new complication descriptor with an associated dictionary of user data.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: A string that uniquely identifies the descriptor.

items.name: var displayName: String
items.desc: A localized string that identifies complications from the descriptor to the user.

items.name: var supportedFamilies: [CLKComplicationFamily]
items.desc: The families that support this type of complication.

items.name: var userActivity: NSUserActivity?
items.desc: A user activity object that represents the state of the app at a moment in time.

items.name: var userInfo: [AnyHashable : Any]?
items.desc: A dictionary of data that your data source can use to generate timeline entries.
